name: Baby Farm
description:
Hotkeys: 

  • Abilities: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5
  • End Turn: Space
  • Cancel Cast: Right Click

Push the animals to the barn (right side) using your abilities before an animal flees into the forest (left side).

If the game is blurry, try to zoom in our out using your browser zoom so it sharpens up.

Made for the Mini Jam 72: Puzzles! We only had 3 days so the game isn't as polished as we'd like it to be, but it is still playable. Thanks for playing!

Credits:

  • Game Design: David J. Ross, Xavier Normant
  • Programming: David J. Ross, Xavier Normant
  • Art: Xavier Normant
  • Music: Samuel Ross
